about_the_game:
[338 338] is a arcade game that combines a cozy atmosphere with maze exploration.

Join the bees on their epic journey to collect honey, but dangerous wasps lurk in their path!

Figure out the wasps' unique patterns and use items to collect the honey safely !!!

[Classic Mode]

> Select the bee icon to play.

> Strategize your way through each stage using the wasps and items provided in each stage.

> Try to clear 120 stages in total.

[Random Mode]

> Select the infinity icon to play.

> Randomized wasps and items change every stage so you can strategize quickly to get the highest score !

> You can play indefinitely until your bee runs out of lives.

[wasps]

> Wasps appearing in 338338 !!!

> Each wasp has its own unique pattern.

> Learn to recognize the patterns of the wasps, then strategize or play on the fly !

[Flower]

> When you eat a flower item on the stage, flowers will collect in the lower left corner.

> The flowers will change color every 5 seconds.

> If you collect all 4 flowers in total, you will get an extra bee life ! Play safer with extra lives !

[Four Seasons]

> Experience different themes through the seasons of each stage !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: intel Core e i5 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia geforce GTX1160
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A arcade game that combines a cozy atmosphere with maze exploration. Avoid the wasps, collect honey and get back to the beehive !!!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Dutch, Norwegian, Danish, Russian, Romanian, Vietnamese, Bulgarian, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Arabic, Ukrainian, Indonesian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Thai, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Finnish, Korean, Hungarian, Galician, Gujarati, K'iche', Nepali, Dari, Latvian, Luxembourgish, Lithuanian, Marathi, Maori, Macedonian, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Mongolian, Basque, Valencian, Bangla, Belarusian, Bosnian, Serbian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Scots, Slovak, Slovenian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Armenian, Assamese, Icelandic, Irish, Azerbaijani, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Estonian, Odia, Yoruba, Urdu, Uzbek, Welsh, Uyghur, Wolof, Igbo, Georgian, Zulu, Cherokee, Tswana, Kazakh, Catalan, Kannada, Quechua, Xhosa, Konkani, Croatian, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Kyrgyz, Tamil, Tajik, Tatar, Telugu, Turkmen, Tigrinya, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, Filipino, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi
